name: Electrocute
description: You send an almost instantaneous bolt of electricity towards a target within a short (10 unit) distance, dealing 10 electric damage if the target fails a defense check of 6. If the target of this spell is within a very short (5 unit) range, the defense check required is 8.
charge: If the damage is not mitigated at all, the target must also roll a concentration check of 7 or higher or become stunned.
